T02n2984u_001:756: nayanatrini rudramālā khaḍga karati kapāla nīlotpalā ||
T02n2984u_001:765: śādhanā śunyatā virāsita rāya śrīciya devi prāṇabindusamaya jolitā (jvalitā) ||
T02n2984u_001:767: namāmi nirālamba nirakṣarasvabhāva hetusphuraṇa saṁprāpitā sarada (śarada)
T02n2984u_001:770: sādhi re cakravarti merumaṇḍala bhavataritā nirmala hṛdayā cakra dhyāyita ahiniśi kṣacara yaṁntamaya (yantrasamaya) sādhanā ||
T02n2984u_001:771: ānanda paramānanda viramānanda sahaja caturānanda je saṁbhavā paramā viramāmājhe na chādile (chāḍi re)
T02n2984u_001:774: hevajrakālacakra śrīcakrasamvara anantakoṭi siddhā pāraṁgatā śrīhata vaṁdiyāne (uḍiyāne)
T02n2984u_001:779: tāla : jhāpa nirmala gaganatu svahita agne trimuha triloyana (trilocana)
T02n2984u_001:782: bhāva-i re śrīyogāmbara virā yogini jāre (jāle)
T02n2984u_001:798: namāmi śrīyogāmbara-i jñāneśvariyā trininetra devi tribhuvana pa-ise purva (pūrva)
T02n2984u_001:799: uttara paścima dakṣiṇadiga devi ḍākini ca-usika vojani cartudiga (caturdiga)
T02n2984u_001:800: tuhma phalantu devi trininetra devi nācanti devi (44)
T02n2984u_001:811: piva-i re mahārasa mahāsukha kṣara-iyā vajadevi (vajradevi)
T02n2984u_001:821: sataguru caraṇaprasāde caturthābhiṣeka prāṇeśvari saṁsāra samudrā ||
T02n2984u_001:825: namāmi śrīvajrayogini lohita taruṇimaṇḍalamājhe prajvalita dehā ||
T02n2984u_001:828: śrīvajrayogini lohita varṇābhā anuttarabodhi pradāyani devi ||
T02n2984u_001:829: tribhuvana vyāpita dahina karati dhāri sahajānanda śvarūpi (svarūpi) devi ||
T02n2984u_001:837: lagati saṁkāsā kuliśa karoṭaka dhārita devi dhrū. ||
T02n2984u_001:838: mukuṭa keśa trini locani devi tuhma devi bhāskara vidyādhari devi ālokika (ālolika)
T02n2984u_001:840: sthiti marupradakṣiṇa dinarātri jagataravāṁcchata (jagata re vāñchīta)
T02n2984u_001:842: guhya devi mārita vidyādhari devi juguti re bheda rajani saṁdhisthi (sandhiritha)
T02n2984u_001:845: udakā khane śuṣka rakā saṁhāra karatā sṛṣṭi saṁkaratā tuhmadevi guhyarādvidyādhari devi marta pātāla tribhuvana cakṣu tuhmadevi rakṣa sarvadeva dṛṣṭa ujyoti re dayābhava devane dṛṣṭa tuhma devi bhāsura (bhāsvara)
T02n2984u_001:846: vidyādhari devi raśmi pañcavarṇa chulitā lakṣato raṣṭa (naṣṭa)
T02n2984u_001:847: timira sarvasatva naṣṭa svaraśmiṁ kara sarvasatva na dṛṣṭa tuhmadevi chādira ananasye devi devāri pāśa khaṅgata guru-upadeśe tuhmadevi kalavira vidyādhari devi ||
T02n2984u_001:850: jhāpa śrīhevajra nerātmā devi tribhuvana nāthā pañcajina vyāpita pañcavarṇadehā ||
T02n2984u_001:861: jhāpa viṣaya viṣaya vinu pavana saṁyoge jvara-i (jvala-i)
T02n2984u_001:863: nābhikamale daha-i jinavimvu śaśi jharayi śurata (surata)
T02n2984u_001:866: name namo mañjughoṣa kālacakra hevajra saṁvara (samvara)
T02n2984u_001:867: viśvarūpaṁ pa-i paduma saṁyoge saṁbhava niścarā sahajā ānandamaya jñānarūpaṁ vajraparyyakaśana (vajraparyyaṅkāsana)
T02n2984u_001:869: akṣobhya dhyānaṁ jagata dukha nāśana bodhiphaladāyakaṁ yogadharmamoha bhāva hṛdayaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:870: guruvākya dṛḍha dhariyā arddhapavana kuṁciya maṇimakuṭa candradi ato dhariyā ca-u cakra pātra śarīra surya (sūrya)
T02n2984u_001:875: dhariyā gāvanti suratavajra janma janma morū buddhaśaraṇaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:877: tāla : durjamāna vajramaya bhūmi śodhiya maṇḍala bhedani vajribhava vajravandha hū saptarasottara (saptarasātala)
T02n2984u_001:881: gṛhna hū phaṭa gṛhna gṛhna hū phaṭa gṛhnāpaya hū phaṭa āmeho bhagavaṁta vidyārāja hū phaṭa khedaya alikhedaya (arikhedaya) ||
T02n2984u_001:882: hāta karājiya cinta uchiya vajraprākāra hū va hū aṣṭadigamāra palāyata re sarvavighna kṛta khaṇḍara ||
T02n2984u_001:883: nagaṇa nirāvandhakuliśa nivāraya vajravitāna hū kha hū vajrapaṁjala (vajrapañcara)
T02n2984u_001:885: kriḍati maṇḍala rāyavīreśvara sarvasatvahiyā pramodakara sataguru ājñāśilyagata (śiregata)
T02n2984u_001:888: mātha gandhamaṇḍala madhye vaṁkāra saṁjātā dvibhūja ekamukha prithvī devi (pṛthvī devī) ||
T02n2984u_001:893: saumyarūpīni devi sarvama bhayaṁkara loke saṁtāraṇi ||
T02n2984u_001:896: divyālaṁkāra bhūṣita dehā hāranaupura nirghoṣa vasundharā ||
T02n2984u_001:898: ekatāla nirmāṇāmbuja madhyegata kalaśā pañcāmṛtamaya paripuritā vidhamaya (viṣamaya)
T02n2984u_001:901: hū karahū vajrācārya mantra vinyāśita karmavajrī sahitā prajñvāsvarūpiṇi vajra siṣyābhimata paripūrṇa hetunā bhava samudra taraṇi timira haraṇā
T02n2984u_001:902: pūrvadala gata pañcasūtra saraṁjātā pañcaviṁśati bhedita buddhakārya dakṣiṇadalagata vajra khasama svarūpaṁ tribhuvana samarasa pāya viśuddhi
T02n2984u_001:903: paścimadalagata pañcaśodhita dhavalavarṇasiddhi rasaṁ bhājitā uttaradalagata ghaṇṭāghoṣa nāditā jñānasvarūpini viśvajanani ||
T02n2984u_001:904: urddhādidalagata śvetapītārūṇārakta śyāmavarṇarajapiyāre puṣpa vinyāsita vidhamaya (viṣamaya)
T02n2984u_001:910: deśa-i anuttara bodhipadaṁ jarāmaraṇabhaya bandhana mocaya paramāmṛta bhaya paramaguru ||
T02n2984u_001:912: ehi vatsa mahāyāna nayottama dehi cintāmṛta pānarakta deśa-i rakṣa hama gocara guhyaka tathatānuttara bodhipadaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:917: padaṁ mantrādijala darpaṇa śarakṣepa daśavalamati pada bhāsuraṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:933: guruprasādā anuttarakṛpā dehi me mātā saṁsāra samudrā ||
T02n2984u_001:936: tāla : mātha vāma dahine edu-i gharaṇe mājhe virāsa-i (vilāsa-i)
T02n2984u_001:943: gayane mayane citta virāśa-iyā kāyavāktti (kāyavākacitta) eku kariyā ||
T02n2984u_001:945: la-iyā āca-i re pāna gāhyā (gāndhā) dhāri (vāri) ||
T02n2984u_001:946: pāva-i re guru pāya prasāde bhana-i vākavaja (vākavajra)
T02n2984u_001:950: kavane rūpa lokeśvara kavane rūpa buddhaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:956: jaṭi sakala jagata guru samvara virā (vīrā)
T02n2984u_001:959: samvara kurumayi toṣaṁ khaṭvāṅga ḍamaru grivye naraśiramālā ||
T02n2984u_001:961: nācai-ā vividha vikalpa vināśana rūdhā samvara aṅkurasya nirajanaṁ (nirañjana)
T02n2984u_001:963: anuttara dhanagati sayala viśuddhā nācai-ā devi vārāhi tuhma maṇḍita dehā ||
T02n2984u_001:964: (54) bhavabhaya haraṇaviśāla viśeṣā samvara kehu vore (vole)
T02n2984u_001:969: ratipati svarjja nivāsana ruddho samvara phalahu hama bhamala śucchandro ||
T02n2984u_001:970: tribhuvana nātha eku samvara rāyā nācai-ā bhāvābhāva kṛtāhati mati citto anupama śukharasa (sukharasa)
T02n2984u_001:974: mātha śuprati maṇḍita maṇḍala cakraṁ ucchīta chatra pratāka (patāka) vitānaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:975: supati nādita turya manekaṁ tadanucagita vareṇa manojñaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:978: jātrāhi eku mahāsukha nāmā nṛtyaṁtu gita sanakara sela ||
T02n2984u_001:981: buddha cari cara buddha guṇeśaṁ ekha nidānaṁ bhavatikṣaṁ svayaṁbhu ||
T02n2984u_001:982: vadhatu jena jaṭā parimucchita tena buddhaṁ buddhavibhāvanayā viparita midaṁ sakalāyaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:985: jhāpa ko-ile vaṁśā vāji re vinā anuhata sarvadeva tribhuvana riṇā (līnā) ||
T02n2984u_001:987: anupama pujire dāraka la-iyā bheri re ṛddhi siddhi rohi praśāde ||
T02n2984u_001:988: gaṁgā jamunā e du-i tanti śvaṣire ravi śaśi gagaṇa duvāre ||
T02n2984u_001:992: pavana pañcāre eku re vaddhā viparita karame dāraka siddhā ||
T02n2984u_001:997: vāsuki nāgā garjita meghā gahvara śmaśāne aśvaka vṛkṣā ghurnita meghā takṣaka nāgā dhru. ||
T02n2984u_001:998: indrayamajalayakṣa bhutavahnivāyu rākṣasadigavidiga valideva tire aṣṭaśmaśāne chatriśaṁ vīreśvara nāca-i sahajānanda re kaṁkari ghoṁrā vartita meghā jvālākulā kakoṭaka nāgā karaṁka (kalaṅka)
T02n2984u_001:1000: vartitameghā sarasija nāgā cuṭaka vṛkṣā atuta hāsā śaṁkhapāla nāgā pracaṇḍa meghā vartamari rūhā (mahīrūhā)
T02n2984u_001:1001: lakṣmīvānā karaṁjavṛkṣā ghūrnita meghā mahāpadmanāgā ghora śmaśāne pakati vṛkṣā ananta nāgā puraṇameghā kilikili lāvā (rāvā)
T02n2984u_001:1002: arjuna vṛkṣā kulika nāgā varṣaṇa meghā (57)
T02n2984u_001:1004: vadanā dvādaśanayanā bhana-i karṇāpā rākhahu śaraṇā kālirātri ripu cāpa-i mardanā 63. (NC. not collect this song)
T02n2984u_001:1011: re hū hū hū hūkāra karaṇe nānā vihā raudra mahāvali pūjā ||
T02n2984u_001:1012: samayā rakṣantu yogāmvara devā vāhuri vāhura ca-umukha nayanā ||
T02n2984u_001:1013: śitaya karaṁka cchatrā vali śobhā puṣṭi karaṁka samākula vayane ||
T02n2984u_001:1014: raudra mahāvali pitṛvana gayane madyamāṁsa maccha (matsa)
T02n2984u_001:1018: ekatāla nirmāṇādicatuṣaṣṭidala saroruha madhyegata kādivṛta nādarūpī (58)
T02n2984u_001:1024: oṁ namāmi devi śrīvajravilāsini tribhavaharaṇa khasama jñānadevi vaṁdiyāna (uḍiyāna)
T02n2984u_001:1028: cakraṁ dvātriṁśatadala kamala mahāsukhacakra hūkārarūpa śrīherukanātha ||
T02n2984u_001:1029: daha-i jinavidhyādi titayā bhedani śrāva-i mṛtadhārayā (amṛtadhārayā)
T02n2984u_001:1030: nādarūpi pīṭhādi daśabhūmi sugatapūjani jinajñāna dāyanī vīreśvarī ||
T02n2984u_001:1032: sumarante vajradevi janmajanmamoru tuṁjuṁ pāya śaraṇā durgati nāśana mokṣapradātā ||
T02n2984u_001:1035: jhāpa gokudahana pañcajñāna svarūpa pañcāmṛta rasa pañcasāri (pañcasāli) pujiyā ||
T02n2984u_001:1042: pañcabuddha pañcaskandha svarūpaṁ devāsura nara pramudita hṛdayā ||
T02n2984u_001:1043: oṁ ā hū hrīṁ kha svadhana (śodhana)
T02n2984u_001:1047: jhāpa ṣaṭayogini devi tribhuvana vyāpini vighna māra duṣṭa darpa vināśini ||
T02n2984u_001:1049: namāmi śrīvajravārāhi ṛddhi siddhi dāyani jagata janani ||
T02n2984u_001:1050: purvadalaṁgata raktavarṇāṅgī īśāne yamini devi niravadanā (nīlavadanā)
T02n2984u_001:1051: vāyuvye mohini devi śvetavarṇābhā paścime saṁcāriṇī devi gauravarṇa dehā ||
T02n2984u_001:1060: jhāpa oṁ āḥ hū phaṭa antare svāhā mantra uccāraṇa re pūjā pujyaka pujya bhāvye tatva svarūpa vali bhāvyeta dhrū. ||
T02n2984u_001:1061: kha kha khāhi valipura re gha gha ghāṭaya vighna hare paṁcamiyā rasa (pañcāmṛta rasa)
T02n2984u_001:1064: sarvayakṣa rākṣasa bhuta preta piśācotamā paramāre ḍākaḍākini du-i aṣṭaśmaśāne idaṁ vaji gṛhatu re (gṛhantu re) ||
T02n2984u_001:1065: dānapati sarvakārya tatvayā sarvasukha saṁpanti śānta re jathaiva tathaiva tujartha piśeva jighratha mātrakā (mātṛkā)
T02n2984u_001:1067: samaya rakṣantu dānaprati re sarvasiddhi sampada śāntire āsaṁsāra tathāgata vacana sarvasiddhi sampada vṛddhire ||
T02n2984u_001:1070: mātha dvibhūja ekamukha raktavarṇā nagana mukuṭa keśa trini rocani (locani) ||
T02n2984u_001:1072: namo devi buddhaḍākini viśvajanani tribhuvana vyāpita jinajñāna dāyani ||
T02n2984u_001:1073: dahine karavajra virāsita dagdhaṁti vāme kaṭoṭaka caturmāra saṁpivathi ||
T02n2984u_001:1077: śrīvidyādhari devi suranara sahitā sakala ṛddhi siddhi dehi me mātā ||
T02n2984u_001:1080: jaṭi pañcasūtra gurutatva tripadma utpati vajravirāśi (vilāsinī) devi ||
T02n2984u_001:1083: ḍākinya graheṣu puriśa vṛkṣa kagvā khaṇḍārohā lānyā syāmārtha vāme ||
T02n2984u_001:1084: (62) kanaka sana mādakṣiṇe rūpi niṣṭhā pūjopātra catura kuṇa patridigavidiga ||
T02n2984u_001:1085: pañcapiyuṣapūrṇā pradoṣṭhā sthāna doṣā jayatu bhagavatu ḍākini vārāhikoṣṭhe ||
T02n2984u_001:1093: yasmābhāryyā sva sva sthāne ānandamuruti vajramaṇḍala padmāvali nida ||
T02n2984u_001:1095: dānaprati sarvavighna nivāraṇaṁ guru upadeśa mokṣaphalaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:1101: namāmi śrīvasuṁdhārā devi jinajanani cintita manasāranidhāri bhadrakaleśa (bhadrakalaśa)
T02n2984u_001:1102: vāmakara dhāri dhānyamaṁjuśrī prajñāpustaka dhāri nidhidarasana ratna maṁjali (mañjari)
T02n2984u_001:1104: praṇamita dhāri lokeśvaravajrapāṇi ilādevi jambhala varuṇa maṇḍala jakṣā (yakṣa)
T02n2984u_001:1107: jhāpa kumbhanirājana pañcajñāna svabhāve rakṣa ravi jamutpannā nibhātvasi mahāsvabhāvaṁ māmaki sura sundarīta vajrayogini ||
T02n2984u_001:1109: namāmi devi śrīvāruṇi rasita vajrā tubhiṣe jamutpannā āliṅgaṇe savineya sanasthitā ekamukha trinilocani devi ||
T02n2984u_001:1112: dhvajā gaḍā vajrana valaṁ dapa thamesave ||
T02n2984u_001:1113: apara uddhakara pheṭaka dhanuvajra vandha khaṭvāṅga kamalante triśura (triśula)
T02n2984u_001:1115: oṁ ha hoḥ hrī hūkāra harante varṇa samṛtyākāraṁ bhāvayeta tenābhava ahini saṁkula vāruṇe sopamadā vajrabhavamālā ||
T02n2984u_001:1118: jhāpa mahāpañcapātra samayācāri tu va-iḍhā ve daśadiga daśavala ārādhiyā re samayānanda bharanti ho ||
T02n2984u_001:1121: ne maṇḍalamohani viśvaphaliya ehakārā validāna devi dānapatiya vighna nivāraya ||
T02n2984u_001:1125: amoghasiddhi mājhe akṣobhye samayā ānande bhāti ho-i ||
T02n2984u_001:1126: siṁhanāde vājiyā re ḍamarūprasāde aṣṭayogini dānapuṇye jālandhara puṇye avadhura-iyā (avadhuta la-iyā)
T02n2984u_001:1131: devāśura asuravīrā sarvalambodara bhiṣaṇa vayane piṁgalakeśa nilavarṇābhā ||
T02n2984u_001:1132: netā sadādi vājiyā re ānanda nāca-i devavali mahākāla yogini bodhiyā re ||
T02n2984u_001:1140: dharmacakravarti indrabhūṣita layiyā mahākāla u-esi saṁvṛti paramārthasiddhi svabhāvye (svabhāve) ||
T02n2984u_001:1147: lāmā sthāpita varṇa karati pātra ḍamaru khaṭvāṅga dharā ||
T02n2984u_001:1148: paścimadvāre khaṇḍārohā raktavarṇa pretārūṇa ḍamaru khaṭvāṅga pātra karati dhāri ||
T02n2984u_001:1150: dvāre pretādvāre rūpini śyāmāvarṇa kartipātra khaṭvāṅga ḍamaru sahitā ||
T02n2984u_001:1156: dinakara maṇḍalamadhye sthitā rakta dharmodayā cāpiyā tādevi (tāṇḍavī)
T02n2984u_001:1160: bodhi pradāyani dvibhūja ekamukha trinilocanā lohitavarṇa prajvalitā ||
T02n2984u_001:1161: tribhuvanavyāpini dahina karoti dhāri marjapurita kapāladhāri cakrīkuṇḍala kaṇṭhidhāri hāthe locaka vibhuṣiṇi ||
T02n2984u_001:1162: caraṇe naupure dahine karaṭi mekhalā naraśilamālā vibhūṣitā (67)
T02n2984u_001:1163: viśvajanani paramaguhyeśvari bhavabhaya tāraṇi vīreśvarī sahajānandaśvarūpini (svarūpini)
T02n2984u_001:1167: jhāpa pūrvadvārāsita udayāgiri vividhapuṣpa phalavṛkṣasaṁyutā sucarasarā gandharvapāśā āditya kiraṇajvala ābhāsā ||
T02n2984u_001:1169: puṣpadala vāvakṣa vṛkṣādi bhramara kokila lādera maṇi arciyāre pramuditā vighnavāraṇa dhuradharā śrīsataguru ājñā digaṁvidigaṁ pujitā ||
T02n2984u_001:1170: dakṣiṇadvāre gandhanādane giri nivāsita devāsura saṁgatā vihaṁgaṇa gaṇā bhramara nināda vikāśita puṣpamanoharā utavikṣāvyena varaye pārā āmodabhūṣaya utasitikṣe ||
T02n2984u_001:1172: acandravṛkṣā dhanavārā vaiduryaratnā rasapūrṇa devadānavagaṇa śeṣyamānā deviṣya mānā śikharavikirṇā ghanatarūpa (dhanada) śobhitā ||
T02n2984u_001:1173: uttaradvāresita ravirājo hima kanakaya puṣparūtā gaṁgātirthādi vahavya bhāvā yakṣayakṣaṇigaṇa virāsita nābhigaṁ śunyandhamanohara sirayā sarvatrasiddhārayabhūmi udasā ||
T02n2984u_001:1176: jhāpa caṇḍa āditala saphalajña advaya vipāka vimarddalakṣa ||
T02n2984u_001:1179: anuhata jñara janmataragira karuṇa śṛṁgāra virājita rasya ||
T02n2984u_001:1201: mātha śūnye nirañjana paramaprabhu śunyemāyā saṁhā-u bhāvaha ciya saṁhāvatā no nāsima-i jāmvu ||
T02n2984u_001:1202: na-u bhava na-u nirvāṇaṁ tahi ehu so mahāsukhavajra yo bhāva-i mana bhāvata so parasāhayi karjja ||
T02n2984u_001:1203: akṣara mantra vivarjjayo na so bindu na citta ehu so parama mahāsuho no bhedi na citta ||
T02n2984u_001:1204: jima parivindu saṁhāvadā tini bhāva-i manabhāve śunya niraṁjana paramaprabhu no ta-i punye na pā-u ||
T02n2984u_001:1205: jima jala mājhecandra sahito svaccha na miccha tini so maṇḍala cakraḍātana ye saṁhāvye svaccha ||
T02n2984u_001:1208: mātha citta cakrāṣṭhā re hū vija saṁjātā re nilavandhita pullita pīṭhastha khaṇḍa kapālādi vira pracaṇḍādyā saṁpuṭa nilavarṇa ca-uhātha atiśobhitā
T02n2984u_001:1210: name (namo) nātha tuhma jina bhuvaneśvara daśadiga sthita bhavatārakaraṇaṁ vāhyakāṣṭhā re āḥkārodbhavāruṇa kāmarūpa pīṭhasvabhāva akuryādivīre
T02n2984u_001:1211: airāvatyādi saṁyoge raktāsya veda vāha vajraghaṇṭa khaṭvāṅga ḍamaru dhāritā kāyacakrāṣṭhā re oṁ bhava śukra vajravandha pīṭha pretapurī mahāvārādi (mahāvārāhi) vira ||
T02n2984u_001:1212: cakravegādyāliṅgita śuklā śuca-u bhūjā indu śuklavarṇābhāmadhyalaṁkṛtā caturaviṁśavireśvara pracaṇḍādyāliṅgita tribhuvana kampita triyānasaṁsthitā
T02n2984u_001:1213: chatriśaṁ vīra devi ekaśunya svabhāvā gamane bhanayi śrīkuliśanīla prasādāṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:1224: yamapati ghoraṁ gauravarṇābhā kolāsyā iva yamabhayaṁ haraṇaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:1238: mātha bhāskara bindumaṇḍala mājhe suśobhitā pañca ḍākaḍākini susaṁvṛtā ||
T02n2984u_001:1240: naumi śrīvirāśini pāda caraṇa pujā vīravīreśvarigaṇa dvandāliṅgaṇā ||
T02n2984u_001:1242: śuklamudrā mauli kuṇḍala kaṇṭhi mekhalā naupura ||
T02n2984u_001:1244: nāgacarmaḍamaru khaṭvāṅgā pātra paraśu pāśa triśula muṇḍumālā ||
T02n2984u_001:1250: trihūrā namāmi namāmi śrīherukacandraśekhara virā viśvakuliśa jatā (jaṭā)
T02n2984u_001:1252: tenā hū hū tenā hū hū sayara (sakala)
T02n2984u_001:1256: padā namāmi ālikāli pracāpita dvādaśabhūja bhuvaneśvarā ||
T02n2984u_001:1257: ḍamaru karoti kuṭhāra triśulā khaṭvāṅga kapāla pāśa vahmaśirā (vrahmaśilā)
T02n2984u_001:1258: namāmi caturviṁśati pīṭheśvara vira viyāpita trinilocanā ||
T02n2984u_001:1267: cāpa-i sambhoga sayara dhi mayane rāga virāga du-i mājhe niṣarṇā ||
T02n2984u_001:1274: mātha hū hū hū dehadharu saṁsāra tanu dvaṁdā (dvandvā)
T02n2984u_001:1277: hevajra tuhma tenā hū hū tenā tete hū hū hū ||
T02n2984u_001:1281: durjamāna samiraya hūta bhūja kamala dhara-i cakra sauvarṇa varajala jayana prasphuliya (prasphurita)
T02n2984u_001:1282: dinamani sāyara gaura mantra kathita yuga ālidhapadaṁ (āliṅgaṇapadaṁ) ||
T02n2984u_001:1284: hū hū hū āḥ oṁ āḥ hū āḥ hū hū hū ||
T02n2984u_001:1285: muṇḍumāla vyāghra carma bhuṣita ṣaḍamudrā hārākāra vasa śobhākaraṁ daha-itha (daśahātha)
T02n2984u_001:1286: prasāri re māra vidāra mantravaka bhiṣaṇa liya śamukhaṁ (samukhaṁ) ||
T02n2984u_001:1287: viśvavajra paṅkaśira nārā śaṁkha śeṣa re sohiya nādavalaṁ jvalita kuliśa ghaṇṭa mṛdutara dvibhūja heruka āliṅgaṇa liṇaciyaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:1288: (74) samala sumaha vociya nāda-i nāṭaka raṅgena samala bhuvaṁ avadhuva payiśa-i sahajaśrī samvara anila taraṅga nalina gati ||
T02n2984u_001:1292: parama rato na ca bhāva na bhāvaka na ca gṛha na ca śrāvako grāhaka ||
T02n2984u_001:1294: mutra na viṣṭhā na ca ghṛṇa moha na sauca (śauca) na pavitra ||
T02n2984u_001:1295: rāga dveṣana moha na īrṣā na ca peśunya samāna na darpa ||
T02n2984u_001:1296: bhāva abhāva na mitra na mantra nirataraṅga sahaja viśuddhi ||
T02n2984u_001:1297: (75) yena tuye na tu buddha tiloka tena tu tena tu buddha mucya ||
T02n2984u_001:1298: lokā bhudyati vetti na tatva tatva vivarjita siddhi na lapye ||
T02n2984u_001:1299: tasmā tu gandha na śabda na rūpa naiva rase na ca citta viśuddhi ||
T02n2984u_001:1300: sparśa na dharma na sayara viśuddhi śuddha svabhāva na jago jagu janme ||
T02n2984u_001:1304: karati gajacarma vibhūṣita nāca-i samabhūja nayana rante (ratne)
T02n2984u_001:1305: bhairava kālirātritala cāpa-i praṇamāmi hū hūkārā ||
T02n2984u_001:1306: uthabharāḍo samvara karuṇāmaya dehā janma janma tuju saraṇāgati (śaraṇāgati) ||
T02n2984u_001:1307: pralayānala jarāmaraṇabhayaṁmiva jvalajvalantaṁ sahaja guṇa joṭirūpa ānanda muruti puṣpa śarirā jarāmaraṇaṁ bhava duḥkha vināśana praṇamāmi hū hūkārā ||
T02n2984u_001:1311: dhara dahina karti pāyala naupura muṇḍu (muṇḍa)
T02n2984u_001:1314: yogini trini netra devi tribhuvana payise (pa-iśe) ||
T02n2984u_001:1319: devi tribhuvana devi śunyapātra devi śunya svabhāve ||
T02n2984u_001:1321: saṁhāra rāyā karuṇaka rāyā mokṣamārga tuhma devi sevita devi ||
T02n2984u_001:1324: sakala jagata guru samvara virā anupama karuṇa karita (kalita)
T02n2984u_001:1326: samvara samvara kuru ma-itoṣa vividhi kalpa vināsana (vināśana) rudhaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:1327: devi vārāhi tuhma maṇḍita dehā bhavabhaya haraṇa viśāla viśeṣo sakala vighna hanti matiprati rugo ratipati svarga nivāsa rūḍhā (ruddho) ||
T02n2984u_001:1328: bhāvābhāva kṛtāhati maticitto anupama sukharasa magna sukhacitto ||
T02n2984u_001:1332: sarvāthāre kāla vikāle sphuliyā ule trinikāle sarva virūpate pūjika jimajala ragaṁle māyā ||
T02n2984u_001:1333: (78) hū tu jaṁ tu vaja kavāle (vajra kapāle)
T02n2984u_001:1334: ma-i pariśvahiyaṁ valiyā re pañcāmṛta rasa kuliśa ullola gokudahana pañcaśāle ||
T02n2984u_001:1335: oṁ āḥ hū phaṭa kavaliya vule ciya samaya raviśaśiyāre caraṇa pharaṇa saṁhāre advaya mahākurubhūte ||
T02n2984u_001:1336: indra yama yakṣāre bhuta vahi vāyu rakṣāre candrasūrya du-i kandhāre tāla pātāla aṣṭa nāgā ||
T02n2984u_001:1337: idaṁ vali jighrāre phala dhupamāṁsa svahiyā re kṣānti bha (kṣobha)
T02n2984u_001:1338: phaṭa kandhāre dānapati re sarvakārya sādhare ||
T02n2984u_001:1339: karṇapā vali adhiṣṭhāna vali mārabhaya bhaṁgāre rājā dānaprati sayara satva āyu ārogya ||
T02n2984u_001:1345: bhāvāre śrīyogāmvara virā yogini jñāneśvara karuṇa nācayi ||
T02n2984u_001:1346: ḍākini maṇḍala cakraphaliyā maṇḍala koṇe vidigana saṁsthitā ||
T02n2984u_001:1348: ghori vetāli caṇḍāli siṁghini vyāghri jambuka ulukini ||
T02n2984u_001:1349: (79) ḍākini dvipini ca-usikaṁ bhojani janma janma bhaya dukha vināsini (vināśini) ||
T02n2984u_001:1355: tenā hū tenā hū tenā na hū hū hū dahina khatpara vāmapātra āliṇapadaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:1356: harihara brahmā indra caturamāra kṛṣṇavarṇadvibhūja trinilocanā ||
T02n2984u_001:1357: dahina karti vāma khaṭvāṅga pātra namo hū śrīhevajra nairātmā devi 95. (NC not collect this song)
T02n2984u_001:1362: tenā hū hū tenā hū hū cakri kuṇḍala vala (vara)
T02n2984u_001:1367: ghāghara vyāghracarma jaṭā makuṭa viśvavajra śuklamuṇḍa arddhacandra cakra ||
T02n2984u_001:1368: savye kara vajra vāme ghaṇṭa bhairava kāli āliṇapadaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:1374: ṇīla (nīla) varṇa devi karati kapāla dharā jagata mokṣakari śrīnairātmā devi ||
T02n2984u_001:1386: jhāpa kaṭi-e karuta devi rudramāla cchāde (hāthe)
T02n2984u_001:1389: nāca-i e kāli tribhuvana brahma sye e kāli sayā (sa-ala)
T02n2984u_001:1390: ravi brahma sye tuhma e kāli ||
T02n2984u_001:1391: tuhma vācchali devi nānā rūpe ekapāda tori gayene (gagane)
T02n2984u_001:1393: tuhma vācchali devi jagata ulani toha bharāṁta śrīheruva la-iyā ||
T02n2984u_001:1394: pāli bhairava ubhaya saṁcarane sacarācara vaja (vajra)
T02n2984u_001:1400: bharaṇa dhariya karasāṁ dhira nāca-i śrīheru lāyā (la-iyā)
T02n2984u_001:1401: meru maṇḍala vasahe padamāra vahmā cāpi re caturamukha harihara indrā sahaja yogini leyā (la-iyā)
T02n2984u_001:1405: indrāyani rācchi gauri upabhāve svāmi hamāre cāpa-i ghare śrīheruva vajralāyā śaśi navaka-i (canaka-i)
T02n2984u_001:1412: jhāpa kṛṣṇavarṇa tanu dvādaśa bhūja grivye ca-umukha caraṇa bhairavakāli ||
T02n2984u_001:1414: nācai re śrīsamvara lāyā vajravārāhi āliṁgaṇa (āliṅgaṇa)
T02n2984u_001:1422: jhāpa gauri cauri vetāli ghaśmari puṣkali (puṣkari)
T02n2984u_001:1428: caraṇaghāghare ve pañcabhūṣaṇa vibhūṣita caṇḍamālā digamvarā paṁcāmiya (pañcāmṛta)
T02n2984u_001:1430: daladravye bhūja tapaṁ mṛmayanā vimara (vibhala syamvu)
T02n2984u_001:1435: jhāpa viśvakamalopari pavye kapāla suryaythā hūkāra saṁjāta kṛṣṇavarṇa dehā ||
T02n2984u_001:1439: trimukha ṣaṭbhūjā prativakra trinetrā mula kṛhna (kṛṣṇa)
T02n2984u_001:1444: ghaṇṭa karati triśula dharā ṣaḍamudrābhūṣaṇa naraśilamālā (naraśiramālā) ||
T02n2984u_001:1452: heruva heruva de moru kolā dvaṁvi (ḍomvi)
T02n2984u_001:1458: dahine ḍamaru vāme khaṭvāṁgaṁ aṣṭa yogini meri heruva saṁge ||
T02n2984u_001:1464: vā ravi śaśi vahni dvādaśa nayanā nira (nīla)
T02n2984u_001:1470: herukā kuliśa ghaṇṭa gajacarma ḍamaru ve dhariyā tu paraśu karati pāśā ||
T02n2984u_001:1471: vāma khaṭvāṅga kapāla triśula dhariyā re vahma (vrahma)
T02n2984u_001:1472: kapālā āli du-i cāpa-i yāgāṁdha nāṭanavara (nāṭanaravara)
T02n2984u_001:1475: kapālā vārāhi āliṅgaṇa śobhā travaka bhīṣaṇa vadana nayane ||
T02n2984u_001:1478: viragaṇāyakā sahajānande phaliyā re maṇḍala praṇamāmi śrīheruva lāyā (rāyā) ||
T02n2984u_001:1481: jhāpa cakri cakri sodire dahini caṇḍāli īsthaṁ kāle amoghasiddhi ratnasaṁbhava (ratnasambhava) ||
T02n2984u_001:1488: sarvasaṁ uddhāri re śire cakri muṇḍe ||
T02n2984u_001:1489: pañcatathāgata kaṇṭhadhāri indri prajñopāya uddhāri re ḍamaru khaṭvāṅge ||
T02n2984u_001:1494: mātha e mahi maṇḍala mājhe utabhavitā sasumanā (suṣumnā)
T02n2984u_001:1497: devi bhramaśita urddhagatā gagaṇa śikhara mājhe caṇagatā ||
T02n2984u_001:1499: karaṭi rasapātra dhāri vāma khaṭvāṅga dhvajadhāri (dhvajadhārī) ||
T02n2984u_001:1504: durgati bhītā janma janma tuṁju pa-isyevitā (pa-isevitā) ||
T02n2984u_001:1509: prajñādhṛka rāgarati dveṣarati moharati vaja (vajra) rati re ||
T02n2984u_001:1511: hū namo hū hū namo hū ||
T02n2984u_001:1519: ājita kṣiti garbha kuliśaka rājā gagaṇa garbhadhā rājā kamalakulākula varaya (valaya)
T02n2984u_001:1528: mātha hūkāra saṁjāta sahajānanda rūpadharā vasuloka pāla caitya saṁvṛtā kāvākacītta (kāyavākacitta)
T02n2984u_001:1532: vārāhi śunyatā karuṇāmaya abhyantara jvālāvali cartudvāra catura saṁkuṭāgāra manoharā ||
T02n2984u_001:1534: vāmaghaṇṭā jaṭā makuṭa arddhacandra gajacarma bhūṣitā caraṇa naupura jhṛjhṛṁrā vibhūṣita muṇḍamālā digamvara dehā ||
T02n2984u_001:1536: saṁhāranāthā ānanda nāca-i advaya samādhi vyāpitā ṣaḍamudrā gāḍhāliṅgaṇa maṇḍala paramānanda muruti ||
T02n2984u_001:1537: gāvanti ratnavajra bhana-i gītā guru caraṇa śilegata (śiregata)
T02n2984u_001:1538: dhariya khaṅgati bhaya durgati nāśana aṣṭa ṛddhisiddhivala praśādā (prasādā) ||
T02n2984u_001:1548: trimukha ṣaṭabhūja śuklāruṇa trinetrā viśvakuliśā dvendu (indu)
T02n2984u_001:1550: prathamabhūja dvaya kuliśa ghaṇṭā dvitīya bhūja danti carmotariyā ||
T02n2984u_001:1551: tritīyabhūja ḍamaru khaṭvāṅga kapāla ṣaṭamudrā muṇḍamālā vibhūṣitā ||
T02n2984u_001:1552: (89) āli kāli du-i āligha cāpa-i praṇamāmi caraṇe siddhi pradātā ||
T02n2984u_001:1556: savye ḍamaru karati ughānaṁ itaretu pātra khaṭvāṅga pañca prāco dvāre sthita pratyāliṇacaraṇaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:1559: ghorākaṁ śyāmavarṇābhā dakṣiṇa ghanakakartidadhānaṁ vāmapātra khaṭvāṅga śara udici dvāre sthita pratyāliṇa padaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:1561: bhīmāṅga raktavarṇābhā savye ghanakakartidadhānaṁ dutare pātutra (pātra)
T02n2984u_001:1565: ghorāṅga pītavarṇābhā savye ḍamarukartidadhānaṁ vāmapātra khaṭvāṅga īṣu prācidvāre sthita pratyāliṇapadaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:1567: vandyā vedavadanā trinetra suśobhā dvādaśabhūjā ṣaḍamudrāṁgācakra madhyesthā āliṇacaraṇā ||
T02n2984u_001:1571: dvibhūja ekamukha trinetra nilavarṇa raviśaśi maṇḍala mājhe viśvavajra arddhacaṇḍa (candra)
T02n2984u_001:1574: tenā hū hū tenā hū hū tenā tete hū hū hū ||
T02n2984u_001:1576: vajraghaṇṭādharā kālibhairava pāda bharaṇā digaṁvidigaṁ kākāśyādi yamaḍākini devi ||
T02n2984u_001:1578: dhariyā gāvanti śrīratnavajrakuliśā janma janma śrīsamvaraṇā (śrīsamvaraśaraṇā) ||
T02n2984u_001:1582: paravata nṛtyādhipati gaṇeśvarā maṇi muktā ratnābharaṇa taruṇi kiraṇa saṁkāśa ||
T02n2984u_001:1591: paraśu vānā kuśavajra khaṅga bhiṁdiyāla dahina karā musala dhanu khaṭvāṅga khatpara karati vāme ||
T02n2984u_001:1597: ratnājvalitā muṣika atisundarā dinadatyāsama sukha dātā namostu namostu gaṇādhipati ||
T02n2984u_001:1607: hū hū hūkāra saṁjāta vadanā parva (sarva)
T02n2984u_001:1609: dehā krodhādhipati śrīmahākālā pañcāmṛta darpabhavalinā bhoyana vahma (vrahma)
T02n2984u_001:1619: siddhā naupura nāgā aṣṭanāgā ābharaṇa suśobhā ||
T02n2984u_001:1620: jinavara mauli dhāriṇa me tā buddhaśāsanaśā rakṣa (rakṣaka)
T02n2984u_001:1632: paripurita udhāritā dahine śrīgaṇapati vāme śrīmahākāla sagaṇa maṇḍa (maṇḍala)
T02n2984u_001:1635: viśvaviyāpitā aṣṭabhaya vahūvyādhi durita haraṇā vajradhara prasādi re dāsa bhana-iyā gurucaraṇa moru siddhivala prasādā 114. (NC. 71 no. song)
T02n2984u_001:1637: jaṭi uragābharaṇa śrīlalita tanu śobhā indranīla dyuti piṅgala keśā ||
T02n2984u_001:1638: jagadu kampa kṛpāguṇa devi duṣṭamāra vināśini devi ||
T02n2984u_001:1639: raktanayana trini rudramālā kharṅga karaṭi kapāla nīlotpalā ||
T02n2984u_001:1641: caraṇa śaraṇa śrī-ugratāruṇī mātā bhana-i amoghavajra carita gītā ||
T02n2984u_001:1651: avatārayā re deva praṇamāmi tumaṁgalalokeśvara deva siddhāyogi vandhudatta parikramayā bhuvaṁpati cuḍāmaṇi narendradeva ||
T02n2984u_001:1652: rātrikamala vimvuprakāśita vodhiyā re vāmakamala dhara hātha tumha śubharante roga kuṣṭaka dāridra dukhabhayaharaṇā ||

T02n2984u_001:2033: vicitra vastrakaṁ ruruṇava śṛṅgāra viravīreśvarā bhūñja-i sakala saṁsāra acalā ||
T02n2984u_001:2036: jhāpa aṣṭakṣetrapāla digavidigaṁ bhuvane dhvaṁsila māla (māra)
T02n2984u_001:2038: gagaṇa ruṇaṁ jhuṇaṁkārā gagaṇa ḍamaru ghaṇṭa vājiyāre ||
T02n2984u_001:2046: ghora vetāla saṁtrāśa vadani siṁdhini vyādhrini jamvuka ulukini khaṭvāṅga paraśu aṁkuśa hastā ||
T02n2984u_001:2050: catura vadanā jinajananī devi ḍākini tujupāya śaraṇā pañcamudrā bharaṇa vibhūṣitā ||
T02n2984u_001:2056: jhāpa siṁhādi śmaśāne bodhivṛkṣā varuṇa nāgā karuṇābhā ...śmaśāne silasaṁ (śiriṣa)
T02n2984u_001:2058: namāmi śrīśeṣanāgarāja nāgapuri nivāsitāruṇi maṇi kiraṇā gaḍora (gambhīra)
T02n2984u_001:2060: ...ghorā vartana meghā jvālāṁkulā kaṅkotakṣaka nāgā karaṁjja bhairavā vartana meghā mahāpadmanāgā cutaka vṛkṣā ||
T02n2984u_001:2063: nāgā pracaṇḍa meghā varta mahīrūhā lakṣmīvānā karaṁjja vṛkṣā padmanāgā dhurnita medhā ||
T02n2984u_001:2064: ghora śmaśāne prakṛti vṛkṣā anantanāgā puraṇamedhā kili kili lāvā aruṇavṛkṣā kuliśanāgā varṣana medhā ||
T02n2984u_001:2067: jaṭi kanaka varṇa ekamukha trinetrā vividhi ratnālaṅkṛta dehā ||
T02n2984u_001:2069: namāmi namāmi śrīdhvāskāmini devi tribhuvana vyāpita devi mātā ||
T02n2984u_001:2071: dhāri vāma bhūjo ratna bhājana dharā ||
T02n2984u_001:2072: siṁha dvipo tāruṇi lalitā saṁsthitā suranara ripubhaya nāśani devi ||
T02n2984u_001:2074: maṇḍala mājhe pramodita hṛdayā bhavabhaya haraṇi śrīvasudhārā devi ||
T02n2984u_001:2076: caraṇe moru prasāde tvaṁ devi caraṇe vaṁdita (vandita) pādaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:2085: karani kapāla khaṭvāṅga kara dharā prajvalita urddhapiṅgala keśā ||
T02n2984u_001:2086: uragābharaṇa vyāghracarmma nivāsanaṁ pañcamudrābharaṇa muṇḍamālā pralamvitā ||
T02n2984u_001:2091: jhāpa dvibhūja ekamukha dvibhūja lohita vaktrā khaṭvāṅga pāśa triloka tāraṇi ||
T02n2984u_001:2099: dahina karati vāma kapāla digamvara mukuṭa keśī ||
T02n2984u_001:2100: tridala kamalopari śava upari pādamekena sthitā ||
T02n2984u_001:2106: sthitā vajraparyāṅkasana caturvaktā pīta nīla raktavarṇā pañcabuddhamaṇimukuṭa dharā ||
T02n2984u_001:2109: tribhuvana vyāpitā dharmadhātu maṇḍala maṇiṇḍitā deva devādi devena saṁpujitā anega (aneka)
T02n2984u_001:2111: prathama bhūjamūla dharmacakramudrā dvitīya karadhara kṛpāna pustakā tṛtīya bhūja saktivānaṁ (śaktivānaṁ)
T02n2984u_001:2113: nānāratnābharaṇa vastrādi bhūṣitā sarvatathāgata maṇikṛta mekharā (mekhalā)
T02n2984u_001:2119: gāvanti ratnakuliśa gīta caritā janma janma morutuju śaraṇā ||
T02n2984u_001:2133: siṁdhini vyāghrini jamvuka ulukini ḍākini dvipini ca-usika bhojani janma janma bhaya dukha vināsani (vināśani)
T02n2984u_001:2148: (118) jagata nepāla nātha pramudita hṛdayā abhimata sukhaphala varaprasādā ||
T02n2984u_001:2151: purva vrahmāyanī haṁsamāruḍhā kanakavarṇa akṣasūtra dhāri uttara māheśvari vṛṣa vāhane candradhavara (candradhavala)
T02n2984u_001:2154: hū hū hū aṣṭaśmaśāne nilavāra sahitā aṣṭabhairava gaṇapati sahitā aṣṭaṛddhi amaraṇa mokṣapradātā sumarante pāpabhayaharaṇaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:2155: paścime indrāyani harita vāhanaṁ kuṅkumavarṇa varja (vajra)
T02n2984u_001:2156: hastaṁ dakṣine vārāhi ghanaghorarūpaṁ aṅkuśa sahitaṁ mahiṣā śobhitaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:2158: devi dhumavarṇa karti daṇḍa vetāla ḍamaru sahitā agni digastha kaumāri mayuravāhana rakta rākṣasa varṇa śaktihastaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:2160: devi garuḍavāhane śyāmavarṇā gadācakradhāri vāyavye cāmuṇḍā devi kaṁkāla sahiṁtā siṁhavāhana khaḍgahastaṁ ||
T02n2984u_001:2161: (119) aṣṭakulanāgā medhyā du-i kṣānti kṣetrapāla navodurgā devi praṇamāmi devi śrī-ārādhiyāre bhugati (bhakati)
T02n2984u_001:2169: nāca-i heruva nairātmā devi aṣṭayogini laiyā parama mātari ||
T02n2984u_001:2170: kṛṣṇavarṇā ṣoḍaśa bhūja pharaṇe vyāghracarmmadhara piṅgalakeśā ||
T02n2984u_001:2187: vyāpita tribhuvaneka rūpaṁ pharayi pañcatathāgatarūpaṁ caturaṁ parimaṇḍita maṇḍalā vidiga tārādevi saṁsthitā ||
T02n2984u_001:2204: devi ekajaṭi trijagata janani bhāvābhāva rūpini khaḍga karaṭi kapāla nirātpara (nilotpala)
T02n2984u_001:2207: mālā cakri akṣobhyo miya maṇi kuṇḍala kaṇṭhi ratnasambhava ||
T02n2984u_001:2227: muktakeśā re digākrāntā tuhmadevi jagata janani ||
T02n2984u_001:2235: ṛddhi siddhi valadāyane khaḍga vānāṅkuśa vajrakara varuṇa vāma carma dhanu pāśa dharā ||
T02n2984u_001:2237: tenā hū hū hū tenā hū hū hū ||
T02n2984u_001:2238: ghaṇṭa khaṭvāṅgaka vindu pātreśvaśvari muṇḍamālā ratnabhūṣitā gauravarṇaruṇa (varṇāruṇa)
T02n2984u_001:2240: savye vināyaka bhairava bhāvita sarvabhaya bhajitāṁ (bhañjitāṁ)
T02n2984u_001:2243: mānāya kiruruṁ vādani śrīcaṇḍikā siṁha pṛṣṭhopari padmacaṇḍāsana bhaktajana pratipālitā ||
T02n2984u_001:2248: kāyāgni vāyu bhedani kāyā sarva tirthī (123) dhrū. ||
T02n2984u_001:2249: vola gire lāvu tuhma yogini vandhava sayara (sakala)
T02n2984u_001:2251: ānamāne te moru hastakapālā kāyā caṇḍa (candra)
T02n2984u_001:2252: kāyā sūryakāyā nakṣatra mālā paṇḍita sayāra vihāra pati yau jhujhuhu (vujhahva)
T02n2984u_001:2253: bhikṣu bharāḍvā kāyā gayā kṛta kāyā mahāvoddhi (mahāvodhi)
T02n2984u_001:2254: kāyā sarva tirtho aṣṭa samudra viśva kāruṇā (karuṇā)
T02n2984u_001:2258: devi thāvire śrīsaṁgha bharāṇḍā 160. (NC. 86 no. song)
T02n2984u_001:2260: jhāpa raktapaśu dehā dvibhūja ekāsyā nagara (nagna)
T02n2984u_001:2263: namo devi vidyādhari devi tridaśāyani vyāpini ṛddhi siddhi dāyani jaga (jagata) janani ||
T02n2984u_001:2280: ārādhiyāre samayā ānanda bharati ho-i dhrū. ||
T02n2984u_001:2281: viravireśvarā va-ithā cāre maṇḍala mohana viśvaphaliyā ekārā validāna devi dānapatiya vighna niravāṇā (nirvāṇā) (125)
T02n2984u_001:2287: ho-i samādhi śrīcakrasamvara mājhe śrīkālacakra hevajra (hevajra)
T02n2984u_001:2289: meri vindujānaṁ devi samayānanda bharatina ho-i siṁhanāda vājiyā re ḍamaru hide (hṛde)
T02n2984u_001:2291: pūjā avadhuva la-iyā karṇapācaraṇa bhanati ho-i 162. (NC. not collect this song)
T02n2984u_001:2294: kiraṇa lalita pracaṇḍa śobhā nirmala hṛdayā karuṇāmayanātha dehi abhaya vala pradātā ||
T02n2984u_001:2296: tuhma devi yūgyetā tribhuvana vyāpita jagata udhāri praṇamāmi vuga lokyeśvara ||
T02n2984u_001:2305: pradātā darśana pāpa dukha haraṇā raktavarṇa mukha nayana sulocanā ||
T02n2984u_001:2307: saṁpurṇa ratna khacita cchatra dhāriyā (dhariyā) re ||
T02n2984u_001:2313: bhānumaṇḍala mājhe jvalita hūkārā āli kāli du-i cāpa-i herukā ||
T02n2984u_001:2320: khaṇḍārohā rūpini ca-u devi kridanti vilāśā ||
T02n2984u_001:2332: namāmi namāmi śrīgaṇapati caraṇe ṛddhisiddhibaladāyakaṁ durita haraṇa śubhamaṅgala dāka (dāyaka)
T02n2984u_001:2340: kacchapā girini nivāsita gaṇapati vividhī (vividhi) puritā ||
T02n2984u_001:2349: mātha pañcaḍāka ḍākini viravireśvarī pañcacala śrīcandra mahāroṣana(ṇa) ||
